row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 4)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 9)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 1)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 3)
row_desc: Queen has two mini challenge wins.
col_desc: Queen returned to the competition during any season.
Queen has at least one lip sync win.
Queen has at least three lip sync wins.
